name: Awakened
description: Your mind has been awakened to its psionic potential.

options.name: Action : Telekinesis
options.description: You can telekinetically move an unequipped object within a short (10 unit) distance. Objects under 5 bulk move up to 5 units freely. Heavier objects require a concentration check exceeding their bulk; failure deals 1 psychic damage per bulk as feedback. If used as a projectile to attack a creature, the target must make a defense check greater than the object's bulk or take physical damage equal to its bulk. You can also telekinetically use throwing weapons with this action, but replace the throwing attack roll with a concentration roll.

options.name: Telepathic
options.description: You can communicate telepathically with willing creatures within a moderate (20 unit) distance of you that you can see.

options.name: Sensitive Mind
options.description: Your mind is incredibly sensitive to psychic stimuli. Your concentration skill is upgraded. You have a -3 penalty to your maximum resolve and a -3 penalty to psychic mitigation.
